name: YAOFLOWERS ONLINE FLORIST
overview:
About the website

This website is an Internet and telephone marketer of flowers and specialty gifts. http://www.yaoflowers.com

About YaoFlowers YaoFlowers’s misson is to quickly deliver high quality flowers and dedicatedly designed gifts at competitive price.

YaoFlowers delivers all orders through its owne or affiliate local flower shops. Even some gifts that need to ship by courier, YaoFlowers takes the responsibility of double-checking the address, tracking the shipment, and contacting sender if there is any problems.

Fresh flowers, Superior service quality, and 100% satisfaction guarantee, are what YaoFlowers promised and relied on to grow its business.

About Local flower shops YaoFlowers runs flower shops in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, and Shenzhen, and affiliate with the best local flower shops in other cities. All the products and pictures in the website are made and taken in Beijing and all floral artists in top 30 biggest cities are trained in Beijing by the designer of these products. All these ensure the flowers delivered are the most close version with the picture. However, the flowers delivered are fresh and many in bud stage and therefore it may be different from the pictures shown online.

About YaoFlowers Worldwide YaoFlowers delivers to more than 30 countries in the world. We works directly with local flower shops to deliver your order. Just as it is in China, there is some areas that we ship the gifts by courier but YaoFlowers takes the responsibility of double-checking the address, tracking the shipment, and contacting sender if there is any problems.
